article_title: Photos: New Yorkers Protest Ferguson, Mo. Grand Jury Decision
article_text: News Corp is a network of leading companies in the worlds of diversified media, news, education, and information services.

twitter.description: Protests in New York City continued this week, following the Nov. 24 decision by a grand jury not to indict a Ferguson, Mo., police officer in the shooting death of a black teenager. Demonstrators gathered in Union Square late Monday to show support for the Ferguson, Mo. community.
twitter.title: Photos: New Yorkers Protest Ferguson, Mo. Grand Jury Decision
